title: Root (disambiguation)
content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Root (disambiguation)

Root may refer to:

  • From farming trees
    • Oak roots, obtained from clearing an oak farming tree.
    • Willow roots, obtained from clearing a willow farming tree.
    • Maple roots, obtained from clearing a maple farming tree.
    • Yew roots, obtained from clearing a yew farming tree.
    • Magic roots, obtained from clearing a magic farming tree.
  • From Wintertodt
    • Bruma roots, found in the four corners of the Wintertodt's prison, cut for bruma roots to fuel the braziers that drain the Wintertodt's energy.
    • Bruma root, obtained by chopping bruma roots, used to burn the brazier that is used to drain the Wintertodt's energy.
    • Sprouting Roots, found on the west and east walls of Wintertodt's prison, and used to obtain bruma herbs used in rejuvenation potions.
  • Limpwurt root, a secondary ingredient used in Herblore
  • Fossilised roots, obtained by cleaning an unidentified large fossils, used as a part of a set of five in one of the five plant displays in the Varrock Museum's paleontology exhibit.
  • Ent's roots, a drop from Derwen in Mage Arena II miniquest that must be returned to Kolodion.
  • Shrunk ogleroot, a quest item in the Grim Tales quest.
  • Arcenia root, a quest item in The Digsite quest.
  • Phren Roots, cut to get three phren bark from within The Gauntlet
  • Phren Roots (The Corrupted Gauntlet), cut to get three phren bark from within The Corrupted Gauntlet
  • Roots and Flutes, a music track unlocked during the fight with Bryophyta.
  • Evil root, an item found during the 2013 Halloween event.
  • Spirit roots, an unobtainable item.
 This page is used to distinguish between articles with similar names.
If an internal link led you to this disambiguation page, you may wish to change the link to point directly to the intended article.
rawContent:
{{External|rs}}
'''Root''' may refer to:
* From [[farming trees]]
** [[Oak roots]], obtained from clearing an [[Oak (Farming)|oak farming tree]].
** [[Willow roots]], obtained from clearing a [[Willow Tree (Farming)|willow farming tree]].
** [[Maple roots]], obtained from clearing a [[Maple Tree (Farming)|maple farming tree]].
** [[Yew roots]], obtained from clearing a [[Yew tree (Farming)|yew farming tree]].
** [[Magic roots]], obtained from clearing a [[Magic Tree (Farming)|magic farming tree]].
* From [[Wintertodt]]
** [[Bruma roots]], found in the four corners of the Wintertodt's prison, cut for bruma roots to fuel the [[brazier]]s that drain the [[Wintertodt]]'s energy.
** [[Bruma root]], obtained by chopping [[bruma roots]], used to burn the [[brazier]] that is used to drain the Wintertodt's energy.
** [[Sprouting Roots]], found on the west and east walls of [[Wintertodt]]'s prison, and used to obtain [[bruma herb]]s used in [[rejuvenation potion]]s.
* [[Limpwurt root]], a secondary ingredient used in [[Herblore]]
* [[Fossilised roots]], obtained by cleaning an [[unidentified large fossil]]s, used as a part of a set of five in one of the five plant displays in the [[Varrock Museum]]'s paleontology exhibit.
* [[Ent's roots]], a drop from [[Derwen]] in [[Mage Arena II]] [[miniquest]] that must be returned to [[Kolodion]].
* [[Shrunk ogleroot]], a [[quest item]] in the [[Grim Tales]] [[quest]].
* [[Arcenia root]], a [[quest item]] in [[The Digsite]] [[quest]].
* [[Phren Roots]], cut to get three [[phren bark]] from within [[The Gauntlet]]
* [[Phren Roots (The Corrupted Gauntlet)]], cut to get three [[phren bark]] from within [[The Corrupted Gauntlet]]
* [[Roots and Flutes]], a [[music]] track unlocked during the fight with [[Bryophyta]].
* [[Evil root]], an item found during the [[2013 Halloween event]].
* [[Spirit roots]], an unobtainable item.

{{disambig}}
